review: You basically get what you paid for. Very few apps that run on it, and there's no way to have all of the apps in the same place, you have to download each one onto your phone (which takes up more memory).
author: Henessy Portillo

review: Uses ALL of my bandwidthfor the whole monthin just a couple of days!It constantly updates(even when not in use!)it is always updating the background images from google.
author: Redneck Gremlin

review: I would order a different product if I wanted to "cast" from my computer.
author: Solomon Valley Books "Bruce Caldwell"

review: Needs more compatible apps. Needs more open streaming. Overall good UI and functionality.
author: Xavier
